data.name: Automobilista 2 - Racin´ USA Full Expansion Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Racin´ USA Expansion Pack has arrived for Automobilista 2, bringing some of the most iconic North American race tracks and cars from some of the major series in the country.

This pack includes all 3 parts of the Expansion Pack with Part 1 and 2 immediately available, and Part 3 will be released later in 2022, each featuring 3 unique venues and a collection of cars, including open wheelers and oval racing.

Part 1 includes:

TRACKS
  • Daytona International Speedway (featuring to road courses, with oval expected to be added later)
  • Weathertech Laguna Seca Raceway
  • Acura Grand Prix of Long Beach

VEHICLES
  • DPi Class (featuring Cadillac DPi-V.R)
  • GTE Class (featuring BMW M8, Corvette C8.R and Porsche 991 RSR)

Part 2 includes:

TRACKS
  • Cleveland Burke Lakefront Road Course
  • Watkins Glen International
  • Road America

VEHICLES
  • Formula USA Gen1 featuring Reynard 95i & Lola T95
  • Formula USA Gen2 featuring Reynard 98i, Swift 009c & Lola T98
  • Formula USA Gen3 featuring Reynard 2Ki & Lola B2K/00

data.short_description: This Pack includes all 3 parts of the Racin´ USA Expansion Pack, bringing the best of North American motorsports to Automobilista 2 - Part 1 and 2 are available now, with part 3 to be released later in 2022.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (+ specific versions of 7)
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz Intel Core i5 3450 or AMD FX-8350
  • Graphics: GTX680 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700K / AMD Ryzen7 2700X
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1080Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
